Name.value: Creture Pack Patch For Zombies Lootable

Description.value: Adds a patch to lootable zombies, zombies and animal creature packs. External Mod Dependencies: Wrathmaniacs Lootable Animals, Lootable Zombies A19, Creature Packs Zombies and Animal, firearms expansions 3 and firearms expansion 3 expanded. LOG: Changed the schematic drops a bit. Now the rates are lower for all zombies.
